formElement.label: Devenv Executable:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to the devenv.exe executable. (empty uses devenv from PATH).

formElement.label: Solution File:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to a Visual Studio's Solution file (.sln)

formElement.label: Action:
formElement.documentation: Builds, Rebuild, Clean or Deploy the solution.

formElement.label: Solution Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The solution configuration to build. For example Debug, Release, Debug|Win32 or Release|Win32.

formElement.label: Project File:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to a Visual Studio's project file.

formElement.label: Project Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The project configuration to build. For example Debug, Release, Debug|Win32 or Release|Win32.

formElement.label: Use Environment:
formElement.documentation: Use the environment variables to define PATH, INCLUDE, LIB and LIBPATH.

formElement.label: Working Directory:
formElement.documentation: The directory to change to before invoking Visual Studio.
